item.title: Levels of truth
item.description: I have learnt only one thing in life that I'm sure of so far: That I'm always wrong.

item.title: What is a bug anyway?
item.description: A bug is something that was working earlier but now isn't. Everything else is a feature.

item.title: Shiva
item.description: God does not play dice, Einstein, he is dice.

item.title: the flower that blooms late in my yard
item.description: A Chinese poem by Li Bai, imperfectly translated and adapted.

item.title: Visualizing chess
item.description: Imagining a chess board showing piece / pawn influence.

item.title: Can you hear me?
item.description: The loving algorithm that was meant to serve us all

item.title: Entropy counts
item.description: (and why the second law is obvious)

item.title: Mind
item.description: Is my mind in this world, or is the world in my mind?
